mapper.sql: id, name, code, enableflg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, remark

sbbt.id as id, sbbt.name as name, sbbt.code as code, sbbt.enableflg as enableflg, sbbt.created_by as createdBy, sbbt.created_time as createdTime, sbbt.updated_by as updatedBy, sbbt.updated_time as updatedTime, sbbt.remark as remark
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_base_business_type (name, code, enableflg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, remark) values (#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableflg, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
